info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Northampton, Greensville, southwestern Southampton and southeastern Brunswick Counties and the City of Emporia through 245 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over Dahlia, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dahlia around 200 PM EDT. Garysburg around 210 PM EDT. Claresville around 220 PM EDT. Seaboard around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gum Forks, Bufford Crossroads, Lanes Corner, Henrico, Bryants Corner, Jackson, Slates Corner, Emporia Reservoir, Boones Crossroads and Pleasant Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
